newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 27.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 27.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on Sept 27:
WASHINGTON - Union janitors who clean nearly half the commercial office buildings in the District are threatening a citywide strike on Monday if they fail to reach agreement on a new contract.
ABOARD FLIGHT 21 - Cheers erupted from many passengers as they celebrated the maiden voyage of a tiny new airline with a big name - Pan American World Airways.
WASHINGTON - The Transportation Department declared ValuJet Airlines fit to return to the skies after a three-month shutdown after following a fatal crash in the Everglades last May.
WASHINGTON - A real estate development group has been briefing government officials and civic groups in Virginia on an ambitious plan to redevelop the Potomac Yard site.
